title: ANTHBOT Genie
description: ANTHBOT (SG) PTE. LTD. is an international robotics company registered in Singapore dedicated to garden maintenance and lawn care.We hope to make every garden beautiful, tidy, and evergreen through our innovation. Our values are "innovation, sustainability, health and happiness, and customer-centricity". ANTHBOT will redefine lawn care and improve people's lives by promoting innovation in robotics technology. At the same time, we prioritize sustainability, integrate ecological protection into product design, and protect our living environment. At ANTHBOT, customer satisfaction is the core of everything we do. Listening carefully to customers and continuous improvement will be our way to achieve this goal.
